flawed_nl_solution:
If 4 pugs can clean their house in 45 minutes, one pug will take 4*45 = <<4*45=810>>810 minutes.
Since one pug working alone takes 810 minutes to clean the house, fifteen pugs working together will be able to clean their house in 810/15 = <<810/15=54>>54 minutes
#### 54

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 180, not 810. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
